description:
Ramiro is a 22-year-old local boy who goes to a nearby university, where he is studying Electrical Engineering and Mathematics.
He is very soft spoken and shy, but you can tell he likes to have fun.
I couldn't quite peg him as gay or straight when I first met him, so I just asked him outright.
"I like girls," he told me, looking surprised that I needed to ask.
He told me that he had just broken up with his girlfriend of two years.
In order to loosen him up, we had him draw a big bullseye on a piece of glass and we told him that he needed to fill the circle with cum. That put a big smile on his face and, yes, he filled the circle!
title: Ramiro
